analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/9/0x66208d03526fc7435caa36fc4fe698c9c02a4aed.sol:
	Contract ManualToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/9/0x66208d03526fc7435caa36fc4fe698c9c02a4aed.sol#147-149)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
